fields.name: largeTitle
fields.desc: The navigation bar's title, when using [CupertinoNavigationBar.large].

fields.name: leading
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoNavigationBar.leading} Widget to place at the start of the navigation bar. Normally a back button for a normal page or a cancel button for full page dialogs.

fields.name: automaticallyImplyLeading
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoNavigationBar.automaticallyImplyLeading} Controls whether we should try to imply the leading widget if null.

fields.name: automaticallyImplyMiddle
fields.desc: Controls whether we should try to imply the middle widget if null.

fields.name: previousPageTitle
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoNavigationBar.previousPageTitle} Manually specify the previous route's title when automatically implying the leading back button.

fields.name: trailing
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoNavigationBar.trailing} Widget to place at the end of the navigation bar. Normally additional actions taken on the page such as a search or edit function. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoNavigationBar.backgroundColor} The background color of the navigation bar. If it contains transparency, the tab bar will automatically produce a blurring effect to the content behind it. This behavior can be disabled by setting [enableBackgroundFilterBlur] to false.

fields.name: automaticBackgroundVisibility
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoNavigationBar.automaticBackgroundVisibility} Whether the navigation bar appears transparent when no content is scrolled under.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoNavigationBar.padding} Padding for the contents of the navigation bar.

fields.name: border
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoNavigationBar.border} The border of the navigation bar. By default renders a single pixel bottom border side.

fields.name: transitionBetweenRoutes
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoNavigationBar.transitionBetweenRoutes} Whether to transition between navigation bars.

fields.name: enableBackgroundFilterBlur
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoNavigationBar.enableBackgroundFilterBlur} Whether to have a blur effect when a non-opaque background color is used.

fields.name: heroTag
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.CupertinoNavigationBar.heroTag} Tag for the navigation bar's Hero widget if [transitionBetweenRoutes] is true.

fields.name: bottom
fields.desc: A widget to place at the bottom of the navigation bar.
